subtitle: This recipe is for a starter or you could serve with couscous and salad for a more substantial  meal.

method.text: Blanch the aubergines in a pan of salted water for 6-7 min. Drain well.
Using a teaspoon, scoop out nearly all the flesh leaving a 1 cm border inside and reserve.
Heat the oil in a pan. Gently fry the onion and pepper for 3-4 min.

Add the lamb and cook for 5 min or until browned, stirring occasionally. Stir in the reserved aubergine and the remaining ingredients. Cook over a gentle heat until mixture thickens. Then spoon into the aubergine cases and place into an ovenproof dish or individual dishes.
Beat together the sauce ingredients and pour over the lamb topping.
Bake in oven for 25-30 min or until golden brown.

title: Stuffed aubergines
